description: dish, ceramic-porcelain, white ground, old blue and gold border, landscape in center, 'Lieu dit le nid de aigle, dans le Foret de Fontainebleau', one of the original set of plates made for Fountainebleau, French, XIXc should be renumbered-piece has 20.417.22 on it; cat. card dims H 1-3/8 x diam 9-1/2' White ground, old blue and gold border, landscape in center.
inscription: Lieu dit le nid de l\'aigle, donsl Foret de Fountainebleau
title: Dish
